descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Cade Cunningham drives past fellow rookie Josh Giddey to score in the paint.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cunningham takes it to Giddey for basket down low) 2021/12/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cunningham takes it to Giddey for basket down low

videos.description: Cade Cunningham picks off a pass and finishes on the other end with a dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cade Cunningham takes steal all the way for a slam) 2021/12/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cade Cunningham takes steal all the way for a slam

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scores at the rim despite being fouled by Luka Garza.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (SGA slithers in for and-1 bucket) 2021/12/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: SGA slithers in for and-1 bucket

videos.description: Killian Hayes goes up top to Isaiah Stewart for an alley-oop slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Isaiah Stewart throws down alley-oop) 2021/12/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Isaiah Stewart throws down alley-oop

videos.description: Josh Giddey fires an inbounds pass to Kenrich Williams for a two-handed slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Giddey catches Pistons sleeping with quick inbounds pass) 2021/12/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Giddey catches Pistons sleeping with quick inbounds pass

videos.description: The Thunder tie a franchise record with 44 fourth-quarter points to blow past the Pistons late.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Thunder erupt for 44 points in the 4th to beat Pistons) 2021/12/07 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Thunder erupt for 44 points in the 4th to beat Pistons
